com.nestedbird.models.core.Base

Interface BaseService<T extends BaseEntity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - What type of base entity does this service support
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArtistService, AuditedService<T>, EventService, EventTimeService, LocationService, MediumService, OccurrenceService, PrivilegeService, RoleService, ScannedPageService, TagService, UserService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArtistServiceImpl, AuditedServiceImpl, BaseServiceImpl, OccurrenceServiceImpl, ScannedPageServiceImpl

    public interface BaseService<T extends BaseEntity>
    Base Entity service
